welcome: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your quizzes and helpful resources.
developmentWarning: This application is currently in development phase by IFI-UIT and has not yet been officially released. Please be aware that ongoing support and future development are not guaranteed. Quiz data may be deleted at any time. Features may change or be discontinued at any time.

generation.title: Quizzes Being Generated
generation.emptyDescription: Start creating a quiz to see generation progress here

review.title: Quizzes Needing Review
review.description: Completed quizzes ready for question approval
review.emptyDescription: Generated quizzes will appear here when ready for approval

help.title: Help and Resources
help.description: Learn how to use QuizCrafter effectively

about.title: About QuizCrafter
about.content: QuizCrafter uses LLMs to generate multiple-choice questions from your Canvas course materials. The system analyzes the modules from a course and creates relevant questions that you can review, approve, and export directly to Canvas.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Select course and modules from Canvas
howItWorks.step2: The app extracts PDFs and pages from modules
howItWorks.step5: Export to Canvas as a quiz

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1: Adjust question count based on module content length
tips.tip2: Review all generated questions before approval
tips.tip3: Make sure diagrams and images in the course are explained with text

errors.title: Error Loading Dashboard
errors.message: There was an error loading your dashboard. Please try refreshing the page.

quizList.title: My Quizzes
quizList.description: Manage and view all your created quizzes
quizList.emptyDescription: You haven't created any quizzes yet. Get started by creating your first quiz.
quizList.loadFailedMessage: There was an error loading your quizzes. Please try again.
